TopicTitle: What is up with the broken emails?

Articles.Content:
I recently got an email telling me about an update to the KSP anouncements thread that read this:

*Dear tuckjohn,*

*You are subscribed to the forum Announcements, there have been 1 new thread(s) and 0 updated thread(s).*

[*http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/10-Announcements*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/10-Announcements)

*The following threads are new:*

*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\**

*[Community] Forum Update*

[*http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113583-Forum-Update*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113583-Forum-Update)

*In forum: Announcements*

*Started by: KasperVld*

*Last post: 20th March 2015 16:18*

*The following threads have been updated:*

*All the best,*

*Kerbal Space Program Forum*

Is this the poorly-executed April Fools joke this is discussed [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113585-The-new-forum-is-a-joke)? or is this something different?

EDIT: For clarification, the link to the second post does not work.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-22T20:39:03Z" title="03/22/2015 08:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 22, 2015</time> by tuckjohn**
  
clarification

> 
> The second link([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113583-Forum-Update](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113583-Forum-Update)) does not work.

The deleted thread was the "April" fools joke.

That is what I thought. Thanks anyway though?

EDIT: Any way I could see this post?

> EDIT: Any way I could see this post?

Nope!

> 
> That is what I thought. Thanks anyway though?
> EDIT: Any way I could see this post?

Maybe check the thread discussing it in Kerbal network. It's been rant-quoted so many times, I'm sure you'll get the gist of it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
